attributes.action: Include country of manufacture on all goods descriptions.
attributes.additional_details: I want to support the U.K. I want to encourage the entrepeneurs we've seen during the Covid crisis,re-energise our manufacturing base.,and encourage other purchasers to buy British wherever possible.
attributes.background: I want to be able to know exactly where my goods are being made.All goods should have country of manufacture stated within its description.This will enable people to buy UK manufactured goods ,supporting Brexit and to decline to buy goods from countries who do not manufacture ethically.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324122
